parameters: I...I better be careful down here. Don't
want to end up like this guy.
There's a bunch of b-blood over here...
Did that guy come this way?
W-w-what the hell happened to this guy? He
was alive just a few seconds ago!
Hey wait a second, my camera!
There may be a few new bloodstains on it,
but at least I got it back. I would hate
to lose it, it was a gift form Jett.
Was that...was that one of those monsters?
You stumble as you see the monster through the bars,
and in the process, accidentally press that picture
button on your camera, activating the flash.
Oh my god, I thought I was dead for sure...
Wait a second, was it the flash?
Oh, I see. That monster was so used to
the darkness of the sewer, the sudden
flash of my camera scared it away!
Well, looks like I made the right decision
I don't imagine it'll work for too long
though, the flash only lasts a few seconds.
I'll have to be smart with it.
Looks like this way is blocked off...
I should look for another way.

I should look for another way.

I should look for another way.
Ewww, what is this? It smells awful.
Yeah, I am NOT going in there.

I should look for another way.

wonder if they would've even stopped that
